projects.title: IIITL Classroom
projects.description: The most expanded application I had work on. This application was designed for the academic activity for IIIT Lucknow during the COVID Pandamic. I have worked closely with the concerned faculty and Director for its development.

projects.title: Devsthali Resort
projects.description: It is an ongoing project for the Devsthali Resort. The website allows costumers to view and book Rooms for stay and reserve table for meal.

projects.title: Daily Log
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working for study subject. I had to develop a platform for user to enter their daily activity so that they can tract their work. I have earned A grade :)
